name: thaw-common-utilities.ts
description: Common utility functions implemented in TypeScript.

scripts.all: npm run rebuild && npm pack && npm run deploy
scripts.// allw: rmdir /Q /S coverage & rmdir /Q /S lib & npm run lint & npm run build & npm test & npm pack & move /Y thaw-common-utilities.ts-*.tgz C:\git\npm-packages\
scripts.clean-build-products: rm -rf commonjs && rm -rf coverage && rm -rf esm
scripts.clean: npm run clean-build-products && npm run clean-packages
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build-and-test
scripts.// rebuild-offline: npm run clean-build-products && npm run build-and-test
scripts.build-and-test: npm run prettier-check && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.build: npm run build-commonjs && npm run post-build-commonjs && npm run build-esm
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src
scripts.loc: git ls-files | grep -v package-lock.json | tr -d '\r' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 wc -l
scripts.re: npm run prettier-format && npm run clean-build-products && npm run build-and-test && npm pack && npm run deploy
scripts.f: npm run prettier-format && npm run all
